6.57: reduced  Geostrike damage per second from 15 on each level to 4/8/12/16.
6.60: Poof Rescaled damage from 60/80/100/120 to 50/80/110/140. Reduced cooldown from 20/18/16/14 to 16/14/12/10.
6.61: Increased  Geostrike damage per second from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20.
6.40: Fixed a rare critical bug regarding leveling with Meepo.  Earthbind no longer affects Roshan.
6.41: Meepo clones are no longer hit by  Thundergod's Wrath (Meepo Prime is still hit).
6.42: Geomancer clones now gain 40% of any bonus stats the primary has, instead of only having base attributes + Attribute Bonus.
6.43: Reduced clones stats sharing from 40% to 25%.
6.68: Increased movement speed from 300 to 305. Reduced  Poof manacost from 140/120/100/80 to 80.
6.69: Increased  strength gain from 1.3 to 1.6. Increased base attack damage from 11-17 to 16-22 (total attack damage is now 39-45). Fixed some targeting issues with casting  Poof.
6.49: Poof Reduced manacost from 225/210/195/180 to 140/120/100/80. Reduced cooldown from 60/50/40/30 to 20/18/16/14.
6.58: Earthbind no longer pierces spell immunity. Rescaled  Poof damage from 40/80/120/160 to 60/80/100/120.
6.73c: Fixed Meepo clone from  Aghanim's Scepter interaction with  Tranquil Boots.
6.73b: Fixed Meepo clones not respawning with full mana. Fixed Meepo clones interaction with  Tranquil Boots.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.79: Reduced base armor from 2 to 1 (total armor is now 4.22). Improved turn rate from 0.5 to 0.65. Reduced night vision from 1800 to 800. Reduced  Earthbind cast point from 0.5 to 0.3.  Divided We Stand Rescaled level requirement from 6/11/16 to 4/11/18. Reduced clone stats sharing from 30% to 0% (still 100% when upgraded)
6.78: Increased base magic resistance from 25% to 35%.
6.51: Reduced  Poof cast point from 2 to 1.5.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12.
6.75: Increased  Geostrike damage per second from 5/10/15/20 to 7/14/21/28. Increased clones stats sharing from 25% to 30%.
6.76: Reduced  Poof cooldown from 14/12/10/8 to 12/10/8/6.  Aghanim's Scepter now also increases clones stats sharing from 30% to 100%.
6.71: Meepo can now cast  Eul's Scepter of Divinity on his clones.
6.68b: Meepo clones can no longer use  [[{{{2}}}#Arcane Boots|Arcane Boots]]' active ability.
6.72: Increased attack range from 100 to 128. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Meepo: Grants an extra Meepo clone. Meepo cannot drop his Aghanim's Scepter once acquired.
6.80: Divided We Stand Reduced level requirement from 4/11/18 to 3/10/17. Now reduces Meepo's respawn time by 10%/20%/30%.
6.81: Increased base movement speed from 305 to 315.
6.82: Meepo clones' boot item slots now match whichever slot Meepo Prime has his boots in, instead of always being in the upper left slot.
6.83: Rescaled  Divided We Stand respawn time reduction from 10%/20%/30% to 20% on each level.
6.84: Earthbind and  Poof no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes. Increased  Geostrike damage per second from 7/14/21/28 to 8/16/24/32.  Divided We Stand no longer reduces respawn time by 20%.
